name: Mouse Of Horrors
description:
Childhood pet? More like, childhood VET... 

Chewy has been trapped in a haunted shack, his only goal to escape. Time runs out for him as he is slowly loosing strength after being caught in a mouse trap take too long and he could die from the rapidly spreading poison. He must solve the puzzles to collect the numbers needed to open the keypad coded door to give him a chance at a better life. Hopefully Chewy can escape before the last remaining tenant finds him...

Point and click your way to victory to see a hamster do things no one would have thought were physically possible.. Avoid Mrs Nesbitt as despite her fallic facial features she is in fact a demon in disguise. 

Credits

Samuel Hodgetts - Chief Babysitter

Ellie Abrahart - "Oh shit I forgot, i'll do it now"

Ben Green - Rig Lord, Dab Maker, and all around blender God.

Brad Best - Had to work with the above team members so deserves a medal for that alone.

Keir Mackenzie - You name a sound he can find it in the depths of the internet.
